user.title: Connect to your Divoom Pixoo
user.description: Please enter the IP address of your Divoom Pixoo device.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Divoom Pixoo device. Please check your IP address and try again.

success.title: Connection Successful
success.description: Your Divoom Pixoo device is now connected.

show_message.description: Display a message on the Divoom Pixoo device.

entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Divoom Pixoo device to display the message.

message.description: The message text you want to display on the device.

position.description: The position on the Pixoo screen where the message should start (x, y coordinates).

color.description: The RGB color of the message text.

font.description: The font type to use for the message text.

image.description: The path to the image file you want to display.

image_position.description: The position on the Pixoo screen where the image should be placed (x, y coordinates).
